name: FroggyHop
description:
An endless hopping game with a time limit, add to the timer by collecting clocks and see what score you can get.

Controls
use mouse or A/D to rotate.
Space to jump forwards, you can hold it down.

A game made for the mini-jam-106-frogs.

Everything was made myself except sound/music their part of an asset I bought a longtime ago from sidearms studio.

PS: It's not really polished but I hope you do enjoy trying to get a Highscore. Try beating mine it's 3,500 post a screenshot if you do or write it down in the comments  I'll be looking :p , Remember points are gained for staying alive not going far.
